archimate:BusinessObject.name: Accreditation Credential
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: A Credential issued by an Auditor Accreditor or Governance Authority asserting that a Trust Community Member conforms to the Accreditation requirements of a Governance Framework. See Appendix H.
